description.plain:
Kiari Kendrell Cephus (born December 14, 1991), known professionally by his stage name Offset is an American recording artist from Lawrenceville, Georgia and was one third of the rap trio Migos. In a July 2013 FADER interview, the other members explained how he came into the fold:

Quavo: Offset is fam. He’s been around us ever since 6th grade. We got him to rap in high school. We always stayed in the basement messing around with the beats. He did one song and his voice sounded good. He had a good voice.
Takeoff: He was snapping too. Back then, that’s what the trend was.
Quavo: His verse wasn’t all that, but his voice was good. So he had to work.

On October 31, 2017, Set released a collaborative album with 21 Savage and Metro Boomin, titled Without Warning.

On February 22, 2019, Offset released his debut solo studio album, FATHER OF 4.

body.plain:
Kiari Kendrell Cephus (born December 14, 1991), known professionally by his stage name Offset is an American recording artist from Lawrenceville, Georgia and was one third of the rap trio Migos. In a July 2013 FADER interview, the other members explained how he came into the fold:

Quavo: Offset is fam. He’s been around us ever since 6th grade. We got him to rap in high school. We always stayed in the basement messing around with the beats. He did one song and his voice sounded good. He had a good voice.
Takeoff: He was snapping too. Back then, that’s what the trend was.
Quavo: His verse wasn’t all that, but his voice was good. So he had to work.

On October 31, 2017, Set released a collaborative album with 21 Savage and Metro Boomin, titled Without Warning.

On February 22, 2019, Offset released his debut solo studio album, FATHER OF 4.

songs.title: Clout

description.plain: On this couple’s duet, Offset and Cardi B come together as a fortified unit to denounce those who act impulsively to receive clout. There have been various attacks on their marriage by individuals like Celina Powell who fabricated an entire pregnancy and other individuals who have started rumors and cheating scandals.

songs.embed_content: Read “Clout” by Offset on Genius

songs.title: Red Room

description.plain:
On “Red Room,” Offset raps about various aspects of his life, from his upbringing to his near-fatal car crash. He speaks on the pain not only in his life but that he sees within those around him. He also discusses his life of gang affiliation and many of the things he used to partake in.

The song was accidentally put on streaming services in its entirety on November 30, 2018, which was exactly two weeks before the album’s initial release date. It was swiftly removed from all services but had already been spread around the Internet before the removal was completed.

The song was officially released, along with a music video, on February 14, 2019.

songs.embed_content: Read “Red Room” by Offset on Genius
songs.recording_location: Republic Recording Studios, Los Angeles, CA

songs.full_title: Legacy by Offset (Ft. 21 Savage & Travis Scott)
songs.title: Legacy

description.plain:
“Legacy” is the eleventh track off of Offset’s debut solo album FATHER OF 4, featuring production from Southside and VOU and vocals from Travis Scott and 21 Savage.

In this track, Offset, Travis Scott, and 21 Savage link up to discuss their “legacy” in the streets: killings and riches.

“Legacy” is considered to be the sequel to their first collaboration from 2017: “Ghostface Killers,” as much of the subject matter is similar, and obviously the artists are all together again. Offset handles the chorus, with Travis Scott on the bridge. 21 Savage offers a verse referencing fellow imprisoned rapper 6ix9ine in his own verse.

songs.embed_content: Read “Legacy” by Offset on Genius
